LARSEN & TOUBRO INFOTECH LTD.

L&T House, N.M. Marg, Ballard Estate; Mumbai, Maharashtra - 400 001
India
Phone: +91 22 67525656
Fax: +91 22 67525893
Website: https://www.lntinfotech.com

Business Overview

Larsen & Toubro Infotech Ltd., (LTI) is a global technology consulting and digital solutions Company helping more than 420 clients succeeds in a converging world. With operations in 32 countries, the company goes the extra mile for its clients and accelerates their digital transformation with LTI’s MosaicTM platform enabling their mobile, social, analytics, IoT and cloud journeys. Founded in 1997 as a subsidiary of Larsen & Toubro Limited, the company’s unique heritage gives them unrivaled real-world expertise to solve the most complex challenges of enterprises across all industries. Each day, the company’s team of more than 30,000 LTItes enables its clients to improve the effectiveness of their business and technology operations and deliver value to their customers, employees and shareholders. L&T provides the winning edge to the clients by leveraging Business-to-IT Connect and deeply committed people. L&T has global presence which includes 23 software development centers and 44 sales offices.

Service Portfolio

Cloud

Cloud IaaS

IaaS as a business-driven service model, which results in multiple benefits in infrastructure provisioning, on-demand availability, optimized costs, tools integration and process automation, thus providing value to the underlying business. The company helps its clients execute complex transformation and global scale operations programs, with the help of basic infrastructure support. The company’s services focus on end-to-end cloud adoption, starting with cloud readiness, secure architecture and design, setting up of environment, automated tool-led migration to IaaS, PaaS and SaaS, and workload management in cloud.

Cloud SaaS

Global businesses, irrespective of the sector they operate in, are discovering the advantages of cloud-based solutions over traditional on-premise ones. Accelerated deployments, optimized costs and on-demand scalability associated with Cloud and Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) models, have made them extremely popular with companies looking to enhance business agility. Enterprises desiring leaner operations can leverage LTI’s strong domain capabilities to make a seamless transition to the Cloud. Our Cloud services will help you address challenges related to customer engagement, service optimization, and procurement & ERP integration, among others. LTI has a broad array of cloud solutions, including SAP Ariba for Procurement, Salesforce and MS CRM for Marketing & CRM and SuccessFactors for HR services.

Cloud Native

LTI’s Cloud Native architecture is designed to help digital enterprises innovate, experiment and scale to market demands quickly. Our well-designed outcome-based programs and toolkits for business case-driven portfolio assessment, architecture and Cloud Native enablement, empower your business to take that big leap toward Digital.

Consulting

Organizational Change Management

LTI helps companies plan, lead, and manage such projects, using a systematic Organizational Change Management Approach (OCM). This includes the assessment of the current state, planning and development for the future state, implementation of the change, and ensuring its sustainability in the short- and long-term. Based on the Prosci ADKAR goal-oriented change management model, our approach helps accelerate the adoption of new workflows, while optimizing proficiency and utilization. Leveraging our ready-to-use tools and templates, we provide change management consulting services for application implementations and global roll-outs, and outsourcing and managed services. We have a proven track record of partnering with change management offices, across industries and geographies, to help minimize risk and achieve intended results at lower costs.

Blockchain

With advancements in Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT), various industries are leveraging it to eliminate intermediaries from legal and financial transactions. Popularly known as Blockchain, the technology helps store digital records in a secure and auditable manner, enabling a speedy, safe, and cost-effective transfer of assets. The applications of Blockchain, the underlying technology for cryptocurrencies, have now been extended to payments, identity management, insurance, healthcare, and digitization of physical assets. LTI’s team of Blockchain experts and domain specialists can help companies across industries implement tailored DLT solutions. We help you make peer-to-peer (P2P) transactions faster, more secure and transparent, thereby reducing fraud risk.

Design Studio

LTI’s design practice has been at the forefront of enabling organizations from across industries to curate, measure and deliver compelling experiences for the digital world, leveraging design thinking and participatory design principles. Committed to delivering business to human (B2H) experiences, LTI’s experienced and specialized design talent, is armed with professionals from diverse backgrounds and expertise. These include ethnographic researchers, design thinking consultants, product designers, industry experts, strategists and UI/UX practitioners, coming together to create an ecosystem of design-driven collaborative innovation.

Cloud and Infrastructure Services (CIS)

LTI’s Cloud and Infrastructure Services (CIS) provide reliable, efficient and proven cloud and digital infrastructure services to clients. The company primarily focuses on next-generation technology enablement, automation, intent-driven IT, tool-based service delivery, and operational excellence. Through its focus on the convergence of man and machine through its digital journey, by creating a plethora of solutions, the company caters to the new-age information technology. The company’s CIS practice drives this through adaptive converged ops framework. This framework is a convergence of cognitive tools and cross-skilled workforce, lined-up to manage our clients’ IT operations end-to-end. LTI supports the global IT Infrastructure of many Fortune 100 companies. The company’s success across client engagements can be attributed to automation, advanced Digital platforms and frameworks, in tandem with experience, talent, and tools required to help our clients create, run, and manage the next-generation IT Infrastructure.

Testing and Assurance Services

LTI’s Testing Assurance Services practice is transforming itself to become the best QA partner helping clients with software testing solutions to achieve continuous quality across their run, change and transformation initiatives. Amid the proliferation of digital technologies, and a plethora of applications being launched continuously, companies experience challenges in ensuring software reliability & quality. In today’s hyper-connected world, it’s become essential to implement an in-built quality assurance process to accelerate time-to-market and deliver superior customer experiences. In fact, Quality Assurance as a strategic & trans-formative function has become a Quality Enabler than a Gatekeeper. LTI’s Assurance Services practice helps clients achieve continuous quality across their run, change and transformation initiatives. Our Assurance Platform leverages Automation, DevOps practices, Cloud, Mobile and Advanced Data Analytics, to help you on your digital transformation journey, with seamless customer experience. It combines principles of process re-engineering with machine learning, cognitive computing and artificial intelligence, to boost the efficiency of the test authoring process and its execution.

Cyber Defense Resiliency Service

LTI know the ways to combat cyber risks, and have introduced the Cyber Defense Resiliency Service to ensure this. Our service encompasses complete lifecycle, with cybersecurity services as the foundation tower for cybersecurity management and digital security services – our customized services for digital transformation. LTI’s Cyber Defense services are enabled by our integrated platform for Cyber Defense Resiliency that enables security orchestration and automation driven by analytics and machine learning and delivered through its Cyber Defense Resiliency Centres providing follow-the-sun coverage. Cyber risks warrant an intelligent cyber defense resilient framework, empowered with enhanced visibility. This should be enabled with integrated monitoring & cyber analytics; proactive threat identification using threat hunting & deception; and adaptive responsiveness using automation & orchestration, encapsulated in a comprehensive cyber risk management program.

Applications Management

Application Development & Maintenance

Consequently, there is much demand for Application Development and Maintenance (ADM) Services, which focus on swift development, testing, deployment and management of high quality software. Enterprises also need effective Application Management Services to maintain and upgrade these apps. LTI helps companies rapidly launch and manage connected and intelligent applications, which provide a superior user experience, while reducing costs. LTI’s ADM Services include Application Development, Application Maintenance and Enhancements, Custom Solution Implementation, Legacy Modernization, Enterprise Application Integration and Data Transformation.

System Integration

System Integration Services that seamlessly consolidate disparate technology products and applications, including legacy platforms, can significantly reduce IT complexity and maximize firms’ ROI. LTI offers end-to-end solutions in ERP, Analytics & Information Management (AIM), Middleware and Infrastructure Management as part of its System Integration Services. The company helps its global clients achieve business agility and process efficiency by closely aligning Enterprise IT Solutions with business imperatives. LTI has established strong alliances with global technology giants like SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, IBM, as well as niche IT service providers. The company’s software engineering laboratories and delivery models adhere to the ISO 9001, ISO27001, CMMI 5 and PCMM 5 standards, ensuring high quality services. LTI brings together discrete systems, using techniques like Enterprise Application Integration and Business Process Management, to build competitive differentiators for our clients.

NCR CORPORATION

864 Spring St. NW, Atlanta, GA 30308
USA
Phone: 1-937-445-1936
Website: http://www.ncr.com/

Business Profile

NCR Corporation is a leading software- and services-led enterprise provider in the financial, retail, hospitality and telecommunications and technology industries. NCR offers a range of solutions that help businesses of all sizes run the store, run the restaurant and run self-service banking channels. The Company’s portfolio includes digital first offerings for banking, restaurants and retailers, as well as payments processing, multi-vendor connected device services, automated teller machines (ATMs), point of sale (POS) terminals and self-service technologies. NCR Corporation also resells third-party networking products and provides related service offerings in the telecommunications and technology sectors. NCR’s solutions are also designed to support its transition to an as-a-Service company and enable it to be the technology-based service provider of choice to its customers.

Products and Services

NCR Corporation is an enterprise provider selling a portfolio of digital first software, services, hardware and payments. The Company’s offerings fall into the following categories:

Banking

NCR Corporation offers solutions to customers in the financial services industry that help position of Company customers to win the digital transformation, including API-first platforms to enable customers to increase engagement, reduce costs, generate new revenue streams and enhance loyalty. These solutions include customer-facing digital banking, branch transformation and digital connected services, and use software solutions and platforms such as a multi-vendor ATM management systems software application suite, payment processing software, fraud and loss prevention applications, cash management and video banking software, as well as related hardware including multi-function ATMs, interactive teller machines (ITMs), thin-client ATMs, cash dispensers, cash recycling ATMs and hardware for check and image processing.

NCR Digital Banking

Why NCR Digital Banking?

It’s never been more critical to take another look at your digital strategy. NCR can help you deepen your connections to consumers and businesses with intuitive solutions that set you apart from the competition today—and in the future.

Advanced, single-platform technology

Exceptional customer experience

Continuous innovation

NCR D3 Digital Banking Platform

NCR D3 offers a function-rich, highly-tailorable and API-driven platform that can be hosted or deployed on-premise to help large banks lower cost, decrease complexity and speed innovation.

NCR DI Digital Banking Platform

NCR DI provides community banks and credit unions with exceptional retail and business banking experiences through a highly-configurable SaaS offering that deepens engagement and drives growth.

 

Retail

The Company offers software-defined solutions to customers in the retail industry, leading with digital to connect retail operations end to end to integrate all aspects of a customer’s operations in indoor and outdoor settings from POS, to payments, inventory management, fraud and loss prevention applications, and loyalty and consumer engagement. These solutions are designed to improve operational efficiency, selling productivity, customer satisfaction and purchasing decisions; provide secure checkout processes and payment systems; and increase service levels. These solutions include retail-oriented technologies such as comprehensive API-point of sale retail software platforms and applications, hardware terminals, self-service kiosks including self-checkout (SCO), payment processing solutions, and bar-code scanners.

Hospitality

The Company offers technology solutions to customers in the hospitality industry, serving businesses that range from a single store or restaurant to global chains and sports and entertainment venues, that are designed to improve operational efficiency, increase customer satisfaction, streamline order and transaction processing and reduce operating costs. The company’s solutions include software applications including payment processing solutions for quick-service restaurants, table-service restaurants, convenience and fuel retailers and other businesses, and back-office inventory and store and restaurant management applications, including cloud-based loss prevention video technology and services for the hospitality industries. The company also provides hospitality-oriented hardware products such as POS terminals, SCO kiosks, order and payment kiosks, bar code scanners, printers and peripherals.

Other

NCR Corporation offers maintenance, managed and professional services using solutions such as remote management and monitoring services, which are designed to improve operational efficiency, network availability and end-user experience, to customers in the telecommunications and technology industry. The company also provides such services to end users on behalf of select manufacturers leveraging its global service capability, and resell third party networking products to customers in a variety of industries.

Telecom & Technology Solutions

Enterprise Networking, Managed Services, Telecom Storefront Solution

Global Managed Services

Delivering the highest levels of availability in 160 countries around the globe

The company helps make your operations easier, create a consistent experience worldwide and make sure your network is “always on.”

To compete in the digital economy, businesses are demanding ever-higher performance from their networks. To help your company keep pace, you can trust the company to upgrade and manage your customers’ network infrastructure to the highest specifications.

With decades of experience working with the world’s leading communications service providers and networking OEMs, the company has the technical expertise to get you to market faster and extend your global reach as you guide your customers on their transformation journey.

Manage

Proactively manage the entire support lifecycle of the network, core infrastructure and related platforms and applications with a comprehensive set of services:

  • Remote services for Incident, Configuration, Performance, Capacity, and Security Management
  • Integrated Service Desk (ISD) for automated workflow management with electronic interfacing capabilities to simplify multiple resolver group interactions and reduce resolution times.
  • Best-in-class toolsets from EMC Service AssuranceSuite(TM) and ServiceNow(TM) ITSM, as well as integration into NCR Field Services Management platform
  • 3,000+remote specialists with broad multivendor certifications and a global network of Service Operations Centers

Deploy & maintain

Field service delivery expectations must evolve in an “always on” world where customers demand optimal network performance at all times. From deployment to on-site maintenance, the company supports the core infrastructure and the edge devices that power this new digital world.‍

  • Services include: site assessment, preparation, staging, IMACD (install, move, add, change, de-install), maintenance, enhanced account support, end-of-service life support, transition management, CallOne remote coordination and project management
  • Extensive parts and logistics capabilities through 1,100+ field stocking locations and over 180K unique parts managed
  • Engineers trained in specific Health, Safety, Security and Environmental (HSSE) standards to support industry and customer specific regulations
  • Learning centers in every region of the world to continuously train and certify its people in new technologies

Design

Implementing the best networking requires careful planning and a thorough assessment of current and future requirements. NCR’s consultative Design Services create a network architecture and implementation plan aligned to business and technology objectives.

  • Assessment - includes a thorough analysis of the capacity and infrastructure of the current environment.
  • Planning - provides an assessment and recommendation for specific improvements aligned with customer’s objectives
  • Design - delivers a detail design, statement of work and project plan leveraging industry and vendor best practices
  • Implementation & Test Plan - features a proof of concept for design validation and deployment
  • Knowledge Transfer - enables the customer’s team to support the production ready solution

ORACLE CORPORATION

500 Oracle Parkway; Redwood City, CA 94065
USA
Phone: 1-650-506-7000
Website: http://oracle.com

Business Profile

Oracle Corp., (Oracle) is the world’s largest provider of enterprise software and a leading provider of computer hardware products and services that are engineered to work together in the cloud and in the data center. Oracle Cloud offerings provide a comprehensive and fully integrated stack of application, platform, compute and storage services in all three primary layers of the cloud: Software as a Service (SaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS). Oracle’s on-premise offerings include Oracle database and middleware software, application software, hardware (Oracle Engineered Systems, servers, storage, networking and industry-specific products), and related support and services. The company provides cloud and on-premise offerings to over 400,000 worldwide customers via deployment models that best suit their needs. The company’s comprehensive and fully integrated stack of SaaS, PaaS and IaaS offerings integrate the software, hardware and services on the customers’ behalf in IT environments that the company deploy, support and manage for the customer.

The company’s integrated Oracle Cloud offerings are designed to be rapidly deployable to enable customers shorter time to innovation; easily maintainable to reduce integration and testing work; connectable among differing deployment models to enable interchangeability and extendibility between cloud and on-premise IT environments; compatible to easily move workloads between on-premise IT environments and the Oracle Cloud; cost-effective by requiring lower upfront customer investment; and secure, standards-based and reliable. The company is a leader in the core technologies of cloud IT environments, including database and middleware software as well as enterprise applications, virtualization, clustering, large-scale systems management and related infrastructure. In addition to providing a broad spectrum of cloud offerings, the company develops and sells its products and services to customers worldwide for use in their global data centers and on-premise IT environments.

Oracle's Siebel Clinical Trial Management System enables global clinical organizations to maintain a centralized trial management database while providing users with the most relevant information based on their specific roles and responsibilities. Oracle Health Sciences Trial Management and Monitoring Cloud Service comprised of Oracle’s Siebel Clinical Trial Management System (CTMS) enables effective management of critical clinical trial activities and improved relationships with investigators, from early to late-stage clinical trials. With real-time visibility into clinical trial progress and significant utilization rates of clinic and staff resources, this solution can help to lower costs, while increasing study speed and data quality. These services are part of the foundation for Oracle Health Sciences’ integrated, holistic approach to risk-based monitoring. Oracle Health Sciences Trial Management and Monitoring Cloud Service are fully integrated with Oracle Health Sciences InForm Cloud Service and with Oracle Health Sciences Clinical Development Analytics (CDA). This monitoring cloud enables actionable insight into clinical trials to accelerate clinical development while reducing trial cost and risk.

Oracle’s City Platform Solution are based on three key platforms that can be implemented in any order depending on what local authorities have as existing platforms, existing services, budgets, and plans. The platforms are as follows:

  • Smart Innovations Platform: An integrated yet modular multi-channel (self-service web/chat, email, backed by a local single number contact center) platform for 90%+ resolution of most government service requests
  • Smart Process Platform: An intelligence and enterprise operations platform for continuous improvement of service delivery and identifies which services to prioritize, extend, consolidate or even discontinue
  • Smart Infrastructure Platform: Enables integration and interoperability with the city’s existing siloed legacy IT infrastructure, allows for more embedded intelligence in city infrastructure and modernizes service delivery capability

The Oracle CASB Cloud Service is the only Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) that gives users both visibility into their entire cloud stack and the security automation tool IT team needs. The Oracle CASB Cloud services include Threat Detection, Predictive Analytics, Automated Incident Response, and Security Configuration Management. Oracle CASB Cloud Service protects users entire cloud footprint with automated security monitoring. A pioneering, API-based cloud access security broker, CASB simplifies configuration settings and prevents configuration drift, detects anomalous behaviour with user behaviour analytics, and secures against threats that span multiple cloud services.

Business Segments

Cloud and On-Premise Software Business

The company’s cloud and on-premise software business is comprised of three operating segments: cloud software and on-premise software, which includes SaaS and PaaS offerings, cloud infrastructure as a service and software license updates and product support.

Cloud Software and On-Premise Software

The company’s cloud software and on-premise software line of business markets, sells and delivers a broad spectrum of application and platform technologies through its SaaS and PaaS offerings, which are certain of software applications and platforms that are delivered via a cloud-based IT environment that the company host, manage and support, and through the licensing of software products including Oracle Applications, Oracle Database, Oracle Fusion Middleware and Java, among others.

Cloud Infrastructure-as-a-Service

The Cloud Infrastructure-as-a-Service line of business provides deployment and management offerings for the company’s software and hardware and related IT infrastructure including virtual machine instances that are subscription based and designed for computing and reliable and secure object storage; Oracle Engineered Systems hardware and related support that are deployed in its customers’ data centers for a monthly fee; and comprehensive software and hardware management and maintenance services for customer IT infrastructure for a fee for a stated term that is hosted at its data center facilities, select partner data centers or physically onpremise at customer facilities.

Software License Updates and Product Support

The Software License Updates and Product Support line of business provides customers with rights to software product upgrades and maintenance releases, patches released, internet access to technical content, as well as internet and telephone access to technical support personnel during the support period.

Cloud Security

Security and Identity

Effective and Manageable Cloud Security for Your Most Important Workloads

The company has built its cloud security approach based on seven core pillars to ensure you have the level of isolation, data protection, control and visibility you need for your cloud infrastructure. The company delivers a fault-tolerant, resilient and verifiably secure cloud infrastructure that enables integration with your existing security assets.

Oracle Cloud Security Services

  • Cloud Access Security Broker
  • Identity and Access Management
  • Identity Cloud Service
  • Key Management
  • Web Application Firewall
  • Web Application Firewall (WAF)

Hardware Business

The company hardware business is comprised of two operating segments: hardware products and hardware support.

Hardware Systems Products

The hardware systems products line of business consists primarily of servers, storage, networking, virtualization software, operating systems including the Oracle Solaris Operating System and management software to support diverse IT environments, including cloud computing environments. As a part of the hardware systems line of business, the company offers its Oracle Engineered Systems, including Oracle Exadata Database Machine, Oracle Exalogic Elastic Cloud, Oracle Exalytics In-Memory Machine, Oracle SuperCluster, Oracle Database Appliance, and Oracle Big Data Appliance, which are the core building blocks for Oracle’s data center and cloud computing products and services. The company provides a broad selection of hardware systems and related services including Oracle Engineered Systems, servers, storage, networking, workstations and related devices, industry specific hardware, virtualization software, operating systems, and management software to support diverse IT environments, including cloud computing environments. The company engineers its hardware systems with virtualization and management capabilities to enable the rapid deployment and efficient management of cloud and on-premises IT infrastructures. The company’s hardware products support many of the world’s largest cloud infrastructures, including the Oracle Cloud.

Hardware Systems Support

The company’s hardware systems support line of business provides customers with software updates for the software components that are essential to the functionality of its server and storage products, such as Oracle Solaris and certain other software products, and could include product repairs, maintenance services and technical support services.

Services Business

The company’s services business is comprised of the remainder of its operating segments and offers consulting, advanced customer support services and education services. The company’s consulting line of business primarily provides services to customers in business and IT strategy alignment, enterprise architecture planning and design, initial product implementation and integration and ongoing product enhancements and upgrades.

The company’s services business offerings include

  • consulting services that are designed to help customers and global system integrator partners more successfully architect and deploy products, including IT strategy alignment, enterprise architecture planning and design, initial product implementation and integration, and ongoing product enhancements and upgrades. The company utilizes a global, blended delivery model to optimize value for customers and partners, consisting of on-premises consultants from local geographies, industry specialists and consultants from global delivery and solution centers; 
  • advanced customer support services, which are provided on-premises and remotely to customers to enable increased performance and higher availability of their Oracle products and services; and education services for Oracle products and services, including training and certification programs that are offered to customers, partners and employees through a variety of formats, including instructor-led classes at education centers, live virtual training, self-paced online training, private events and custom training.

Oracle Infrastructure

Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

Oracle Cloud Free Tier; Compute; Storage; Networking; Analytics; Application Development; Cloud Database Services; Content Management; Integration; Management and Governance; Security, Identity, and Compliance; Cloud Marketplace; and Cloud@Customer

Oracle Webcenter Content: Digital Asset Management

Oracle WebCenter Content’s digital asset management capability allows organizations to store, find, view, and use digital assets and rich media quickly and easily. Content, collateral, and individual asset items can be made available instantly in the appropriate formats for use on Web sites, in print materials, or in other programs. Assets can be protected and controlled through rich and configurable access control. Oracle’s digital asset management solution automates routine tasks, such as the process of creating multiple renditions, allowing you to effectively manage and appropriately use your rich media assets. Oracle WebCenter Content helps you address these issues by providing easy access to find and use your rich assets quickly and easily from anywhere. With Oracle WebCenter Content you can quickly create renditions of digital content by turning large images, video, or audio files into high-resolution, low-resolution, resized, or thumbnail versions based upon your business needs. Oracle’s digital asset management capabilities are provided as part of Oracle WebCenter Content which includes: Document Management, Capture and Imaging, Content Publishing, Records Management, Along with restricted use: Information Rights Mgmt, Business Process Mgmt, and Secure Enterprise Search.

Manage Rich Media Files Effectively

Oracle WebCenter Content enables automation of routine tasks and effectively manages rich media files. With secure Webbased access, employees across your organization can quickly and easily access, share, reuse, and modify digital content. Oracle WebCenter Content provides a rich set of digital asset management features, including

  • Workflow, version control, security, archiving, subscriptions, content conversion, collaboration, record disposition, and Web publication assets leveraging core capabilities of Oracle WebCenter Content
  • Content checkin and accessibility from anywhere with Webbased and Windows Explorer interfaces
  • Compression of content to decrease bandwidth demands
  • Automatic categorization of assets for easy searching
  • Quick identifying of files via automatically created thumbnail renditions
  • Asset selection and download in one operation
  • Secure content distribution easily and quickly

Provide a Foundation for Key Business Applications

Oracle WebCenter Content digital asset management capability provides the underlying foundation for a variety of key business applications, such as the following:

Image Management Application

With Oracle’s digital asset management solution, you can easily manage popular image formats such as PSD (Photoshop document), JPEG, GIF, BMP, and TIFF files; store unlimited image renditions in one source for quick reuse of any format or size; and automatically format images to the appropriate size, shape, resolution, or aspect ratio. Multiple renditions, including thumbnails, Web versions and print versions, are automatically created and compressed at the time of checkin for use in HTML pages or marketing collateral - saving thousands of hours of manual labor in resaving files.

Video Management Application

Oracle’s digital asset management solution allows you to work with common video formats such as MPEG, QuickTime, Windows Media, and MP3 files; pinpoint specific scenes of video using a storyboard; and view them immediately. You can store multiple renditions of video in one source for various bandwidth and size requirements and integrate resulting files with streaming servers. With Oracle’s digital asset management solution, you can easily access storyboards and closed-captioned text, while administrators can configure the system to generate appropriate proxies and metadata.

Oracle DevOps

DevOps services and tools automate the software development lifecycle (SDLC), infrastructure operations, observability and messaging for developers. Customers can use popular open source tools such as Jenkins, Terraform, and Grafana to integrate with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for fewer costs, compared to other infrastructure products on the market.

Simplify the software development lifecycle and CI/CD

Visual Builder Studio provides an integrated platform across software and infrastructure for all stages of the SDLC. Version code with hosted Git repositories, set up CI/CD to quickly build and deploy artifacts, and manages the development process with issue tracking, agile dashboard, and development sprint management.

Interoperable with popular tools

Integrate Oracle Cloud Infrastructure with your preferred tools, including GitLab for build pipelines, Grafana for metrics visualization, and Slack for messaging. Use familiar, open source Terraform to deploy infrastructure as code on Oracle Cloud and other environments.

A complete, low-cost solution

Reduce operations costs in two ways: get started quickly with Oracle Cloud’s built-in services for Terraform-based automation, observability, and messaging, or leverage advanced capabilities for hybrid and multicloud environments, application performance monitoring, IT analytics, and log analytics.

Oracle DevOps Services and Tools

Visual Builder Studio

Integrated platform for agile development, CI/CD, and more

A low-cost, integrated platform for development teams with tools for agile development, code management, CI/CD automation, and visual development for web and mobile applications.

Resource Manager

Terraform-based cloud infrastructure automation

Easily and reliably deploy and manage Oracle Cloud resources with this infrastructure-as-code service. Use an unmodified, open source codebases that simplifies migrations from and to other environments.

Developer Tools

Build modern apps to solve today’s business problems

Oracle offers a wide range of tools including Cloud Shell, software development kits (SDKs), and a command line interface (CLI) for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. Automate your app development with capabilities for integrated development environments (IDEs), DevOps, and Oracle Database.

Monitoring

Observability for DevOps, IT Ops, and site reliability

Gain insights on cloud infrastructure and workloads with out-of-the-box metrics for health and performance. Configure Alarms with thresholds to detect and respond to infrastructure and application anomalies.

Application Performance Monitoring

Improve app performance and user experience

Comprehensive end user and app server monitoring, including traces and metrics, with out-of-box knowledge of Oracle Applications including Oracle's E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, and Siebel

IT Analytics

Automate resource planning and forecasting

Get insight into the performance, availability, and capacity of IT resources—including databases, applications, and systems—deployed on premises, in Oracle Cloud, or in third-party clouds.

Logging

Single pane of glass for all logs

Integrate with other Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services and ingest logs from hundreds of sources.

Log Analytics

Troubleshoot issues faster

Collect, aggregate, and analyze logs from any source across on premises, Oracle Cloud, and third-party clouds with machine learning based analytics and topology-aware enrichment for Oracle technology.

Software

Oracle Database; Java; and MySQL

Oracle Virtualization

Backed by affordable enterprise support for hybrid environments, Oracle Virtualization reduces operation and support costs while increasing IT efficiency and agility—on premises and in the cloud. Oracle Linux Virtualization Manager is a new server virtualization management platform that can be easily deployed to configure, monitor, and manage an Oracle Linux Kernel-based Virtual Machine (KVM) environment with enterprise-grade performance and support from Oracle.

Oracle Linux KVM

Oracle Linux KVM is a feature that has been delivered and fully supported as part of Oracle Linux. With the release of the Unbreakable Enterprise Kernel (UEK) Release 5, the Oracle Linux server virtualization solution with KVM has been enhanced. Users can take either a previously deployed version of Oracle Linux and turn the OS into a KVM host, or a KVM configuration can be set up from a base Oracle Linux installation. Oracle Linux KVM is the same hypervisor used in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, giving users an easy migration path to move workloads into Oracle Cloud in the future.

Oracle Linux Virtualization Manager

To support multiple hosts running Oracle Linux KVM, IT administrators can use the Oracle Linux Virtualization Manager that is built from the open source oVirt project. The heart of the management solution is the ovirt-engine which is used to discover KVM hosts and configure storage and networking for the virtualized data center. Oracle Linux Virtualization Manager offers a web-based User Interface (UI) and a Representation State Transfer (REST) Application Programming interface (API) which can be used to manage your Oracle Linux KVM infrastructure. Oracle Linux Virtualization Manager allows enterprise customers to continue supporting their on-premises data center deployments with the KVM hypervisor already available on Oracle Linux 7.6 with the UEK Release 5.

Oracle Utilities Network Management System (NMS) empowers you to fully model, monitor, and control in real time the customer-centric grid that we’re all watching develop. From distribution to the DER-connected customer, Oracle NMS is giving operators the ability to optimize every corner of your system. Oracle NMS arms you with accurate, actionable intelligence - improving reliability and performance across your territory when it matters most.

SAP SE

Dietmar-Hopp-Allee 16 ; 69190 Walldorf

Website: https://www.sap.com/

Business Profile

SAP is the market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and in all industries run at their best: 77% of the world’s transaction revenue touches an SAP system. SAP’s machine learning, Internet of Things (IoT), and advanced analytics technologies help turn customers’ businesses into intelligent enterprises. SAP helps give people and organizations deep business insight and fosters collaboration that helps them stay ahead of their competition. The company simplifies technology for companies so they can consume the company’s software the way they want – without disruption. SAP’s end-to-end suite of applications and services enables more than 437,000 business and public customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and make a difference. With a global network of customers, partners, employees, and thought leaders, SAP helps the world run better and improve people’s lives.

Products

ERP and Finance

  • SAP S/4HANA
  • ERP for Small and Midsize Enterprises
  • Financial Planning and Analysis
  • Accounting and Financial Close
  • Treasury Management
  • Accounts Receivable, Billing and Revenue Management
  • Cybersecurity, Governance, Risk and Compliance

SAP Edge Services

Improve process performance and enable real-time decisions by deploying powerful microservices at the edge.

Intelligent Edge Computing Software

Extend your intelligent enterprise to the edge.

SAP Edge Services deploys powerful microservices at the edge – with robust offline capabilities that can help you gain domain-specific insights, monitor real-time events and actions, and execute enterprise business processes locally – even with intermittent connectivity.

  • Cloud or on-premise deployment
  • Autonomous operations at ultra-low latency
  • Ability to throttle data volumes to reduce costs
  • Cloud-driven deployment and lifecycle management

Key Capabilities

Support For Essential Business Functions

Bring operational data together with enterprise business context from SAP ERP, SAP S/4HANA, or SAP Customer Experience solutions to make decisions locally and execute complex business processes asynchronously.

Real-Time Data Streaming

Analyze IoT data streams in real time to enable pattern recognition and automated events, while defining sophisticated business logic rules and relevant actions.

Optimized Data Storage And Operations

Store IoT data locally and run intelligent edge computing processes close to IoT devices to minimize bandwidth congestion, set local data rules, or extend functionality.

Predictive Analytics

Deploy, execute, and update analytical models using edge computing to predict and prevent real-time incidents and find undetected anomalies.

About

Understanding customer expectations: our source of inspiration

For over 40 years, Sopra Banking Software has been helping banks to transform themselves in order to address various difficulties. Above all, our experience is a long history of challenges and constant reinvention with our customers. 

Our mission

Imagine the bank of the future together

40 years of banking expertise

Sopra Banking Software is a banking software vendor and a major digital player. We have been supporting banks for 40 years. Our DNA? - In-depth knowledge of the banking industry, banking customers, and innovative technologies. This triple focus enables us to build powerful and agile software solutions and to implement them through value-added use cases.

Towards…

A CUSTOMER CENTRIC
approach

In this digital world, user expectations and technologies are changing every day. Being part of the change means knowing your customers better and offering them the best experience; it also means accelerating new services as well as securing their access and delivery. Our solutions' design meets your customers current and future needs and expectations.

Optimise and secure your operations, reduce costs, speed up time to market; this means concentrating on your customers’ needs.

Our locations & history

40 years of banking expertise

Sopra Banking Software is the trusted partner of over 800 customers in 70 countries. We aspire to create added-value and make history working closely with our customers.
By constantly shaking up the status quo and meeting new challenges every day we can offer our services to today’s and tomorrow’s banks. 

Our Offers

Solutions

Meeting new challenges

Here to help you meet today and tomorrow’s challenges

As a bank, you want to focus on your customers and be ahead of their needs. You can rely on our solutions to help you gear up for digital transformation and to meet your core banking requirements, including lending, payments, account management, risk and compliance, Islamic Banking, microfinance and wealth management.  We also offer Saas Solutions for Direct Banks, Reporting or Payments.

Digital eXperience Solutions

Digital eXperience Platform: overview

When it comes to maintaining a competitive edge, the best customer experience comes out on top! Our Digital eXperience Platform is designed to make it easier to create innovative customer experiences and it fosters scalability. This agile solution, which combines technological and business components, is an innovation catalyst and it enables you to provide your customers with even more value.

Digital eXperience Platform (DxP)

When it comes to outrunning the competition, the best experience comes out on top!

Are you seeking to improve your digital customer journey?

Today, customer experience is the number one priority to stay at the cutting edge!

Financial players have to solve a complex equation: digital technologies enable quick changes, open the door to ever increasing competition, while regulation is continuously reinforced.

There are so many reasons why banks should leverage technology, make the most of services offered by their ecosystem, and expand their services beyond traditional financial products.

In light of these challenges, we are creating the Digital eXperience Platform.

Cloud native solution. Open APIs. Developed using DevOps methods. What else?

Leverage your assets

Unleash the power of your core banking system with our agnostic solution!

Invent customer journey

Facilitate customer on-boarding and build a seamless omni-channel journey, by designing a new customer experience and innovative services

Integrate your ecosystem

Easily combine services integrating the best of the Fintech ecosystem, to create ever improved added-value.

Still looking for reasons to change?

  • Less than 40%

of European retail banks'processes are digitised (Source: McKinsey). What about yours?

  • 87%

of customers receive non-personalised information from their bank (Source: Deloitte). What about yours?

  • 12%

is the reduction in cost to income ratios that a wholesale-banking digitalization programmes can deliver (Source: BCG). What about yours?

Ready to move forward?

The Digital eXperience Platform provides business services through APIs to:

· Create new customer engagement schemes
· Improve customer knowledge
· Accelerate personalised distribution of basic products and services
· Design personalised sales process based on customer analytics
· Secure access to bank account information aligned with PSD2
· Enable you to act as a TPP
· Manage end user consent

The Digital eXperience Platform offers an end-to-end solution to provide new services leveraging your own offers and the ones from your partners, operate them and maintain/change them easily.

Digital Experience Platform for PSD2

Supporting your PSD2 strategy

Are you ready for the post PSD2 world?

In Europe, financial players must comply with Open Banking regulations, like PSD2. But it’s not just a question of complying with the directive and implementing regulatory technical standards (RTS). On the contrary, they have to choose their APIs standards and deliver the same service level to their end-users either through their own digital channel or through third party providers’ (TPPs). Not to mention the increasingly demanding burden of responsibilities imposed by regulations!

We have created PSD2 dedicated services in the Digital eXperience Platform. Our services have a dual purpose:

· Addressing compliance for Account Servicing Payment Service Providers (ASPSPs)

· Enabling players to become Third Party Providers (TPPs)

What’s more, you can access other DxP services that enable you to enrich your ecosystem and expand your offering.

Hence, Digital eXperience Platform for PSD2 capitalizes on the regulation to pave the way for new opportunities!

PSD2 Compliance in a nutshell

 Don't worry about compliance, we take care of everything!

E.U. Legislation compliance

Be up to date with legislation changes. Fully compatible with PSD2 and associated Regulatory Technical Standards (RTS)

Consent Management

Precise management of ASPSPs and TPPs

Recognised API standards

Solution designed to meet API standards: NextGenPSD2, STET, OpenBanking-UK and open to others.

Dispute resolution support

Track and trace any request for information and payment initiation. 

And guess what?

There is a general consensus among analysts that digital can generate up to a 20% increase in revenues for banks (Source: BCG). With the Digital Experience Platform we are working to achieve this goal!

Go beyond compliance, and position your business as a TPP!

With this second PSD2 set of services, engage with customers as a Third TPP, PISP or AISP, and connect with FinTechs to create innovative services.

Open Banking Platform

Build, integrate, and securely roll out new services across all 28 EU countries.

 New Services: PISP & AISP

Offer new payment and account aggregation services.

Real-time Operational Intelligence

Monitor usage of new services in real-time. Enable new revenue streams (API calls).

 Disruptive Technology

The DxP is cloud native, with a Microservices-based architecture, core banking system agnostic and open to your ecosystem!

Customer Engagement

Strengthening ties with the customer

In summary

Today, the challenges to overcome to establish a strong and long-lasting customer relationship include constantly adapting to new usages and meeting prosumers’ expectations by developing the added value of offers and services. Our solutions enable banks to transform their customer engagement systems to implement customer-focused, omnichannel, digital strategies.

Key advantages

  • Customer centricity: the right offer, for the right customer, at the right price, at the right time, and via the right channel
  • Reduced time to market thanks to increased marketing agility
  • Increased revenues: new commercial opportunities and long-term loyalty

In detail

Strengthening ties with the customer means promoting their independence but staying ever closer; it means making their journey easier, and proactively offering the services and assistance they need, via the channel of their choice; it also means supporting them with their life plans by providing value through advice and offers which are suitable for their circumstances and needs.
Our Customer Engagement Suite solutions (customer knowledge, offer design and sales process optimisation etc), provide all the flexibility and agility required, via their components, to create even more value and boost differentiation, thus fostering customer engagement.

Digital Wallet

Digital Wallets : A world of opportunities

Digital Wallet Management

Digital wallets are reshaping the ultra-connected consumer’s buying experience. They can now offer services beyond traditional payment activities, giving banks the opportunity to enhance customer relationships, increase market differentiation and create new revenue sources.

Sopra Banking Software’s Digital Wallet solution helps digital wallet providers design and deploy the latest generation of digital wallets successfully. Digital Wallet allows you to bundle multiple services and functionalities on one platform. Its high configurability and flexibility not only result in a strong product differentiation, but also provide you with the flexibility to tune your digital wallet offer to the needs of specific customer segments. Furthermore, Digital Wallet includes the necessary components to manage your apps’ life cycle is traceable and safe.

Business domain components

Here to help you meet today and tomorrow’s challenges

As a bank, you want to focus on your customers and be ahead of their needs. You can rely on our solutions to help you gear up for digital transformation and to meet your core banking requirements, including lending, payments, account management, risk and compliance, Islamic Banking, microfinance and wealth management.  We also offer Saas Solutions for Direct Banks, Reporting or Payments.

Finance, Risk and Compliance

efficiency to anticipate and address constant changes in

In summary

Sopra banking Software’s key differentiating factor lies in its ability to make finance and risk processes used by financial institutions more effective by truly optimising resources. Sopra Banking Software leverages its advanced business and technical skills, as well as its Compliance software suite, which provides an effective response to national and international regulatory compliance requirements.

Key advantages

  • Full compliance with national and international regulatory requirements
  • Risk calculation and management in accordance with Basel III / CRD IV
  • Response to challenges posed by AnaCredit
  • Anticipates changes in European Central Bank reporting processes  (BIRD project)
  • Seamless integration with XBRL (complexity fully and transparently managed)

In detail

Against the backdrop of a constantly changing ecosystem, Sopra Banking Software is helping financial institutions to adapt and improve their finance and risk processes. Its Software suite – Sopra Banking Compliance – dedicated to both business lines - finance and risks - was developed in close cooperation with regulatory organisations and banks. At this stage, Sopra Banking Compliance encompasses regulations currently applicable in over 25 countries. The Software suite covers Basel III / CRD IV risk calculation, ensures reporting required by National Central Banks and the ECB, and it also manages reporting linked to AnaCredit. In addition, it covers banking customers’ fiscal declarations, and FATCA and CRS regulations, and a Finance and Risk data warehouse guarantees consistency across reporting.

Financing

Global financing software

In summary

Digital, End-to-end, Any Product or Asset, Anywhere.

Sopra Banking Financing is a digital, end-to-end solution for managing leases and loans. 

Key advantages

  • Comprehensive Scope: Highly flexible, portal (self-serve) to back solution for managing entire lease and loan lifecycle. Integrated workflow and open, web services architecture for ease of integration with current systems.
  • Risk Reduction: 40 years’ experience with more than 800 customer sites, simulations and origination capabilities to gauge risk levels for customers, tools to build customer commitments reference database, strong arrears features.  
  • Ready Technology: Cloud ready, market ready, digital ready.
  • Lower TCO: Highly automated processes, launch of the same products across several geographies, reduced time to market.
  • Better Compliance: Regulatory harmonization (IFRS9 and IFRS16, European Directives) and risk management (Basel III, Central Bank reporting).

In detail

OPEN ARCHITECTURE FOR IMPROVED SERVICE, AGILITY AND GROWTH

Sopra Banking Financing has strong integration capabilities to third party systems through APIs, web-services or XML interfaces. Business interfaces with external suppliers (e signature, external score, CRM…), internal finance outputs (Bank statements, payment files, GL, PD&LGD (IFRS9), regulatory reporting…) and reporting outputs are part of the solution.

END-TO-END FUNCTIONALITY FOR MANAGING ALL PRODUCTS

Sopra Banking Financing is a solution covering the whole product cycle. It targets several markets, countries, subsidiaries, currency, languages, brands and products.

EXTENSIVE CUSTOMER BASE

Many customers in commercial lending, consumer lending, equipment finance, real estate finance, auto finance and real estate management already rely on Sopra Banking Financing. Why? Because:

  • 40 years of customer relationships
  • +800 customers sites
  • 70 countries
  • # 76 mn of loans and leases managed
  • € 2.5kbn outstanding loans and leases

Customer Engagement

Strengthening ties with the customer

In summary

Today, the challenges to overcome to establish a strong and long-lasting customer relationship include constantly adapting to new usages and meeting prosumers’ expectations by developing the added value of offers and services. Our solutions enable banks to transform their customer engagement systems to implement customer-focused, omnichannel, digital strategies.

Key advantages

  • Customer centricity: the right offer, for the right customer, at the right price, at the right time, and via the right channel
  • Reduced time to market thanks to increased marketing agility
  • Increased revenues: new commercial opportunities and long-term loyalty 

In detail

Strengthening ties with the customer means promoting their independence but staying ever closer; it means making their journey easier, and proactively offering the services and assistance they need, via the channel of their choice; it also means supporting them with their life plans by providing value through advice and offers which are suitable for their circumstances and needs.

Our Customer Engagement Suite solutions (customer knowledge, offer design and sales process optimisation etc), provide all the flexibility and agility required, via their components, to create even more value and boost differentiation, thus fostering customer engagement.

Account management

Faster time to market through process optimization

In summary

Sopra Banking’s Account Management Suite offers the right IT tools to manage all your customers’ accounts thus enabling you to spend less time on manual processes and routine work – and more time on your actual business, and your customers. The solution includes central position keeping, an interest calculation engine, as well as current, savings or deposits account management.

Key advantages

  • Actions based on real-time customer data
  • Scalable to suit financial institutions of various sizes 
  • Quick product creation enabling fast time to market
  • High level of parametrization in product and process definition
  • Straight-through processing for greater automation
  • Precise interest calculation, and margin simulation and prediction
  • Capacity to handle high volumes

In detail

Customer accounts are the very foundations of a bank; you need the right IT tools to manage them. Sopra Banking Account Management is a flexible, centralised solution that offers a real-time position keeping view, can be scaled to the size of any bank, expands with a bank’s development and it supports interest calculations for up to 20 million accounts per hour. Its straight-through processing leads to greater automation, which in turn leads to less time spent on manual processes and routine work. 

The solution also enables you to pool cash, as well as see, simulate and predict margins; it includes an on-line authorization center, as well as the complete management of the product life cycle for all current, savings (regulated and non-regulated) and term deposits accounts. Moreover, its diverse range of functionalities also covers event generation.

Core Banking Solutions

Retail & Commercial Banking

All banks are different. This is why we have developed specialised solutions that provide the best possible response to retail banking requirements: an integrated core banking solution - which can be configured to suit your requirements; and a component-based solution - which can be partially or fully installed, in one go, or in stages (gradual transformation).

Retail and Commercial Banking

The Core Banking Solution that fulfils your expectations

In summary

All banks are different. This is why we have developed specialised solutions that provide the best possible response to retail banking requirements: an integrated core banking solution - which can be configured to suit your requirements; and a component-based solution - which can be partially or fully installed, in one go, or in stages (gradual transformation).

Key advantages

  • Offers omnichannel distribution
  • Process optimisation
  • Digital transformation support [+lien vers Digital Banking Solutions]
  • Enables rapid go to market for new products
  • Anticipates future growth, thanks to its agility and flexibility
  • Live data processing for real time work  
  • Facilitates multi-country operations thanks to localisation
  • Offers alignment across business domains thanks to vertical transformation
  • Makes it possible to rationalise operational layers thanks to horizontal transformation 
  • Ensures regulatory compliance thanks to regulatory maintenance
  • Can be personalised depending on your brands and products 

Integrated solution

Optimum implementation duration
Broad coverage of business requirements
Highly-configurable

Modular solution

Choice of components to  meet your requirements
In-depth coverage of business domains
Service oriented architecture, compatible with third-party solutions

As a retail bank, you are facing multiple challenges which are forcing you to think again: new regulations, increasingly volatile and demanding customers, or obsolete existing solutions. To drive differentiation by offering innovative products and services via various channels, you need to be able to count on a core banking solution that is solid, agile and suitable for your specific requirements.

Because all retail banks are different, we are offering specific solutions to provide the best possible response to your needs. Our integrated core banking solutions offers rich functionalities, enables implementation in optimal deadlines, and can be preconfigured to suit your requirements. The modular solution is compatible with third-party products, it can be either partially or fully installed, in one go, or in stages – this type of approach is often suitable for banks operating in large geographical zones with complicated existing solutions and operations that cannot be suspended.

Digital-Only Banking

Let us manage your infrastructure in SaaS mode and take care of software release and version updates so that you can fully concentrate on direct banking. Thanks to this shared, standard platform you can achieve maximum economies of scale and benefit from various customisation options.

Platform Digit’All

Empower your customer. Boost your business

In summary

You are a recognized bank and you need to launch quickly a new digital-only brand on the market? Or a new entrant which wants to operate as a Bank but this is not your core business?

Platform Digit’all is your solution. It allows you to start a Digital-only Banking business easily and quickly.

Platform Digit’all is available to support all the digital banking services easily. The modern technological features required by your customers are fully covered: Mobile First, Personalised Offerings, Easy day-to-day life support, Smart & Pro-active. And it is ready to accompany you in your business growth.

Key advantages

Customer attraction

  • Mobile First
  • A totally customer centric solution: customer autonomy, customer advice, from onboarding to daily banking or non-banking needs
  • A full product coverage: Deposits & Savings, Payments & Cards and Financing
  • A proven and secure solution

Business Efficiency

  • Quick and Agile time to market
  • An open architecture that allows to benefit from the evolving ecosystem
  • Operational efficiency
  • A scalable solution that fits perfectly to any future business

Global Partner

  • Solutions vendor, integrator and operator – to simplify your operations
  • Sopra Steria Group’s infrastructure management and cyber security experience

In detail

Traditional banks and new entrants face the same challenges, as customers want to have more autonomy, more services adapted to their own personal needs, any time anywhere and on any device. They also want their ‘bank’ to accompany them in all their life moments – not only related to banking needs, be attractive and user-friendly, innovative and connected to a whole ecosystem of potential useful applications.

At the same time you, as a banking player, have to be efficient in your business: find the right business model, optimize your running costs, be able to scale fast on new market segments, etc.

With Platform Digit’All, you have the right answer to all these challenges. It provides an end-to-end digital-only solution to enable you to focus on both customer attraction and business efficiency.

Platform Digit’All is a packaged solution built on best of breed proven components from Sopra Banking Software that can be deployed in a short timeframe. With a modern and scalable architecture that uses open banking features and API to connect with your ecosystem, you’ll be able to ensure that your customers will get the latest innovations and all the needed products and services.

With Platform Digit’All, you can provide your customer with the appropriate service and allow them to be totally autonomous. At the same time, thanks to a strong focus on customer data, you will smartly improve your advice, offerings and day-to-day services, as well as monitor your whole business (operational dashboards, risk and compliance management, etc.).

Last but not least, Platform Digit’All can be operated according to your preferred options:  on premises or externalized on a hosted IT platform.
In the latter case, the level of provided services is also very flexible: pure infrastructure managed services or also application services in SaaS mode, allowing you to concentrate on your business.

Moreover, this SaaS mode is based on a ‘pay-per-use’ pricing model which allows to limit your initial investments and to adjust your running costs in line with your business growth.

For banks to better satisfy mass affluent customers and private bankers to attract and retain their clients, it is vital to offer the kind of services that they are seeking. Our solution’s integrated platform offers everything from investor profiling and portfolio recommendation to transaction and operational execution.

Wealth Management

Complete Customer Dedication

In a nutshell

For banks to better satisfy mass affluent customers and private bankers to attract and retain their clients, it is vital to offer the kind of services that they are seeking. Our solution’s integrated platform offers everything from investor profiling and portfolio recommendation to transaction and operational execution.

Key advantages

  • 360° customer view
  • real-time updates
  • straight-through processing
  • low TCO
  • automation and simulation

In detail

To offer the right type of products, services and advice to your clients, whether Mass Affluent or High-Net Worth Individuals, you need to know what they desire. Sopra Banking Wealth Management helps you in this quest: from initial consultancy, to core banking software implementation and customer care, our solution allows you to be the best possible bank for your customers.

Our solution’s integrated platform offers everything from investor profiling and portfolio recommendation to transaction and operational execution.
Sopra Banking for Wealth Management brings you full 360° insight into your customers, including the possibility to simulate actions or model future behavior. In addition, you can automate a large number of processes, calculations and messages. 

Islamic Banking

This solution covers the entire spectrum of Islamic finance, helping banks, whether conventional or Islamic, to meet their specific needs and offer new products that respect Islamic banking principles.

Islamic Banking

A complete solution for Islamic Finance

In summary

This solution covers the entire spectrum of Islamic finance, helping banks, whether conventional or Islamic, to meet their specific needs and offer new products that respect Islamic banking principles.

Key advantages

  • Sharia compliant finance solutions.
  • Integrated, modular, and flexible solution
  • Designed with Islamic finance experts
  • Wide coverage of business needs specific to Islamic Banking
  • Possibility to gradually implement a broad range of products

In detail

Sopra Banking Software offers solutions and services that cover the entire spectrum of Islamic finance. Both Islamic and conventional financial institutions can rely on us to meet their specific local, and regional needs, and to help them develop their activities. The strength of our dedicated teams lies in their cross-disciplinary implementation, delivery, integration, and support skills, combined with a detailed knowledge of Islamic banking principles.
Sopra Banking for Islamic Banking covers the entire spectrum of Sharia complaint finance: Islamic investments, Islamic deposits, Islamic trade finance, Islamic treasury and Islamic capital markets. The structuring of Islamic financial products on an international scale has seen a significant evolution, driving international organizations to standardize these products. However, countries’ regulatory frameworks and local contexts require specific adaptations to Islamic financing in its practical application. Therefore, Sopra Banking helps Islamic financial institutions meet several challenges, including the need to innovate and develop structured products that respect Sharia.

We know and understand the many challenges that these institutions face. Our solution’s goal is to cut operating costs, develop your offering, and reduce time to market. Furthermore, we can provide you with a wide range of services to support you throughout your project.
